title: Simulation-Based Practical Course for Islamic Religious Education Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of Islamic doctrines and introductory educational science principles
context.additional_context: For pre-service teachers, practicing traditional teaching methods in a VR environment and conducting learning assessments using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can create Islamic subject lesson design documents (RPP) in VR simulation environments.
Learners can develop evaluation tools to analyze student responses in simulation classes applying traditional instructional methods.
Through VR-based discussion activities, learners can implement at least three dialogic learning strategies in Islamic education processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
